item.description:
The Law of Attraction states that the Universe responds to how you feel. Your dominant vibration is your point of attraction. Feel good, and you will attract good.

Do you just wait for good feelings to happen depending on your circumstances; or do you make a point to deliberately create your feeling good state? Do you know how?

The more you deliberately feel good, the better it gets. And, as Abraham says, "The better it gets, the better it gets!"

In January's meeting, you will:
- Learn and practice some simple techniques for creating feeling good states with your imagination -your virtual reality.

- Learn how to enhance your internal imagery to be even more powerful.

- Create associated "triggers" that you can easily reactivate at any time to re access the positive feelings you "rehearse" in your virtual reality.

- Talk about how you can use these techniques to create a positive, feeling good day.

Let's create an amazing evening together with some awesome "take aways".

Please RSVP if you will be attending; and feel free to bring guests! (please rsvp for them,too)

Joy to you!

Ann
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be upstairs. Go to back of front lobby for stairway.

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Deliberately getting "pumped up"-feeling good, anytime, anywhere
